channel.title: Cowl of the Second HoCage - Answered
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Cowl of the Second HoCage - Answered" - Question was answered

item.title: Re: Cowl of the Second HoCage - Recipe Guide Question
item.content:encoded:
Ah. I tried looking at it from the Cowl of the Second HoCage page as well as the Indestructible Thread but neither had it set up right. Never thought to look at the snake rune page though. Thanks a lot Jadian.

-Drivin-

Update: I went around and adjusted the pages off the top of my head that I knew were wrong. However, upon looking closer at the link you provided, Jadian, I think someone needs to adjust that page's URL as it isn't formatted the same as all the other item pages.

item.title: Re: Cowl of the Second HoCage - Recipe Guide Question
item.content:encoded:
Magical Hide Pattern

Though it wasn't linked to from the Cowl's page, it was linked to from the Snake Runes page. Someone just got things wrong when they tried adding the recipe.

item.title: Cowl of the Second HoCage - Recipe Guide Question
item.content:encoded:
So I have heard from multiple sources that the Cowl of the Second HoCage requires an Indestructible Thread in order to make the item. Currently, the wiki doesn't have this information and so i was wondering if someone could verify that I got the procedure correct and fill in the unknown item.

Cowl of the Second HoCage:
*Ingredients-
Snake Rune (Ancient Blueprints needed)
Wasteland Hide Piece x6
Indestructible Thread
*Procedure-
Wasteland Hide Piece + Wasteland Hide Piece = Two Wasteland Hides
Two Wasteland Hides + Wasteland Hide Piece = Three Wasteland Hides
Three Wasteland Hides + Wasteland Hide Piece = Four Wasteland Hides
Four Wasteland Hides + Wasteland Hide Piece = Five Wasteland Hides
Five Wasteland Hides + Wasteland Hide Piece = Six Wasteland Hides
Six Wasteland Hides + Snake Rune = ???Unknown item???
???Unknown item??? + Indestructible Thread = Cowl of the Second HoCage

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks =)
-Drivin-
